item.title: Hill Charts in R
item.description: Context You may be managing a complex project or only focusing on specific tasks at hand. In research projects, the outcomes carry with them uncertainty - if one is a100% sure of its results, well, don’t call it research then. One specific consequence of this uncertainty is that: (a) it is hard to quantify progress on a given task (e.g. is it 75 or 80% completed?), (b) each task may generate n daughters, or even totally vanish after proved irrelevant before its completion.
